nodes.text: Korq was a male Trandoshan, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Korq was hired by Squeerie, a Squib salvage operator. In 31 BBY, they attempted to salvage the remains of a wrecked speeder, in the Almas Wasteland, on Almas. However, they were attacked by Tantron Dow, a Duros Jedi Master, who had fallen under the influence of the dark side of the Force.
